name: SIlver and Gold Exchange
tag_list: sell-silver, sell-gold, cash-for-silver, cash-for-gold, silverandgoldexchange, silver-coins, gold-coins
overview: Silver and Gold Exchange LLC at http://SilverAndGoldExchange.com is a leading online buyer of gold and silver. They feature a live price chart that continuously updates with the market to display what they pay for various types of gold and silver. They are a Better Business Bureau Accredited company with zero complaints. They also pay up to six times as much as competitors. Lastly, they publish consumer information, reviews, and alerts for those wanting to sell gold or sell silver at www.SilverAndGoldExchange.com
